about_the_game:
Project Monsters is a Multiplayer Creature Collection Game. Capture new creatures and battle your friends! 
Discover a brand new world filled with amazing creatures, and set out to find the strongest. Test your skills in battle against other players with our battling system, designed to be easy to learn, yet hard to master. Train your creatures by levelling them up and select the moves you think work best for your playstyle. 



Main Features in Project Monsters:

  • Take Control of your Creatures

Battle other players or other creatures in our combat gameplay! Put your skills to the test and aim to be the greatest!

  • Capture and Level a variety of unique Creatures.

Build your collection and customize their movesets to give you the exact creature you want to use. Tailor each one to your playstyle and level them up on your way to the very top!

  • Exploring a vast Open World

Traverse the ingame world either alone or with your friends! Meet up in various towns or take each other on inside the Stadium! Find new and exciting creatures in the different biomes and discover hidden secrets.

  • Multiplayer

The game features many social features such as Proximity Voice Chat and Trading inorder to enhance the multiplayer experience. 

Future Updates:

  • Building

  • Travel

  • New Creatures

  • More Character Creation Options

  • Modding Support (We love modders and would love to see servers be able to make their own mods to enhance the experience)

Join Now!

Join Now!
name: Project Monsters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 1903 and newer versions
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen R5-1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Project Monsters is a Multiplayer Creature Collection Game. Capture new creatures and battle your friends in a vast Open World!
